data.text: @broadcastchris @j_g_allen Such a smart reply. More people should dig deeper, ask questions and not trust the NEWS.  Thank you!
@broadcastchris @j_g_allen Because then she would have no argument to keep people in fear. Never forget that this idiot wanted to keep unvaccinated people locked up in their homes.
@j_g_allen @drlucymcbride Dude, you are citing data from a year ago. Omicron is not WT or Delta.  Your own examples show this.
@j_g_allen @drlucymcbride How do you then explain the weekly surveillance data out of the UK then?  I personally do not trust anything coming from the US health authorities.
@j_g_allen Josh Stevenson on covid risk to kids. Squint hard or get your glasses. https://t.co/3XolIzK7v2
@j_g_allen If you compare these numbers for teens vs vaccine risks, you should never vaccinate a healthy teen.
